locality: Mont sur le plateau de l'Horombe.

Ampatsakambe PK 474, RN7, Ambalavao - Ihosy (N. Side of the road). Riparian relict forest with Grewia spp., Ficus spp. etc. surrounded by bare granitic boulders & secondary (Heteropogon) grassland.
